diff_act: 1.Enable only one mode to be active at any given time while in the Operations State.

regen.absent_element: specification ensuring only one mode is active at any time
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall strictly ensure that only one mode (normal, training, or maintenance) is active at any time during Operations State.
The system shall ensure that only one mode is active at any given time while in the Operations State.

regen.absent_element: the exclusivity of operation modes (only one mode to be active at any given time)
regen.new_specification: The system shall ensure that only one mode (normal, training, or maintenance) is active at any given time while in the Operations State.

label: The Operations State modes shall not exist concurrently.
absence: action of prohibiting multiple modes from running simultaneously
